topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Extending the Size of a Volume

body.p: You can extend the size of a volume, as needed.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Volumes tab.
From the Edit Volume list on the volume you want to extend, select Extend Volume.
In the Extend Volume dialog box, select the size from the drop-down and click Extend Volume to confirm.
